column3: ‚ÄúI've tried a number of strains recently, trying to find one that can control pain and nausea without causing anxiety or paranoia. I think I've found the right combo in Berry White. The Blueberry and White Widow parents are legendary in their own right, but this phenotype is amazing. I've seen it said that this is a sativa dominant strain, but I have to disagree. The tightly packed buds appear sativa, with a light gre...‚Äù

‚ÄúVery good for opiate withdrawal. I was able to come off pain meds on my first try when I no longer needed them after my surgery helped my pain disease. BW made me much more comfortable during a very physically & emotionally difficult time, I attribute this as a big part of my success!‚Äù

‚ÄúI feel like I don't have arms. I just really want gazpacho. I like leopards and bobcats and Stefan from The Vampire Diaries. In Vermont there are a lot of lesbians. And they tap syrup. I like a Separate Peace by George Knowles. I have all of my teeth. Okay, so the real thing I'm trying to say here in this rainforest is that this shit dope as fuck and I am at a pond and I hear rain and frogs and I'm hearing crickets s...‚Äù

‚ÄúBerry White: THUG. If you want to just chill, smile, blow smoke circles and NOT choke, I present you thee Berry White. It's a truly lovable strain. Although not the most potent, it definitely gives you a nice light but fast high. 2 hits and I was buzzed. Great night smoke, doesn't make you sleepy but if you happen to lay back a little too comfortable, you're out like a light.. Will savor the rest I have. Smoke up, y'...‚Äù

‚ÄúBerry White is absolutely worth the try. The smell and taste are reminiscent of a piney campfire, with a little bit of berry added. The high is effective and strong, yet wonderfully manageable and stable. (I could imagine, though, that a first time user could get a little panicked from the super complete affect of this strain. I get just as head high as I do body high with Berry White, and both highs set in relativel...‚Äù

‚Äúwhite widow is a thought provoking borderline racy for first 30 mins blueberry is always relaxing on the body and euphoric. I would like about a 70/30 BB to WW ratio myself. Alert and able to focus yet content, happy, and extremely relaxed. THC @ 16% is still very high. Most producers  exaggerate THC beyond belief as I'm one who doesn't buy 30%+ flower.  All i know is blueberry @ 16.5% is tasty and has plenty of stre...‚Äù
‚ÄúDeceptively strong. This strain is not very attractive and the smell is mild but it gets me high. It's such a creeper that I filled a restraining order ;)‚Äù

‚ÄúFinally got some, I've been waiting to get my hands on this. The buds are nice looking nothing spectacular but nice, they're sprinkled on the outside clustered trichomes on the inside. The bag smelled like skunky berries but when I broke open the buds they had the aroma of blueberries and gasoline and quite pungent inviting ador. The high is awesome euphoric blast instantly great relaxing body and head buzz after a w...‚Äù
‚ÄúThis is fast becoming one of my favorite strains. It does not make me sing in a deep sexy romantic low voice like Barry White...... But, Berry White is berry
column5: berry good... Happy upbeat mellow high that keeps on trucking and keeps you in a good place for good amount of time.... I will keep this one in the pantry on the top shelf...... You would do right by doing the same.‚Äù"

column3: ‚Äúlove that .. the Bellagio Green Barry White concentrate is the bomb‚Äù
‚ÄúLooked beautiful, when I got a batch it was spelt  Barry White". Oh man the way this strain looked was crazy to say the least.White in color mostly crystals. Fluffy
column4: smelled pungent and a little sour.‚Äù"

column3: ‚ÄúüçÄüçí Berry White is a unique and awesome hybrid. Very balanced and not too heavy, this strain provides a winning combination of effects. The flavor has a very earthy taste and subtle berry undertone to it. Fantastic smoke and even better high. Relaxing at first, then the mood lift sets in. Perfect in the evening or for any social situation. This strain has personally inspired a couple of creative works and deserves s...‚Äù

‚ÄúWow. I pulled 3 times from the Volcano: Berry White has just assisted me in a major breakthrough at work ('tho i am breaking to write my observations;-) My hearing is more detailed and i am noticing nuances in music that i haven't heard since i was a child.*I just made a series of errors" in my work
column4: realized i was thinking way faster than my mouse could keep up
column5: and chuckled at myself! Nice to have fun at work. I'm...‚Äù"

column3: ‚ÄúWow.. This strain will pull you out of a funk in a quickness. Within five minutes of inhaling Berry White I was smiling, laughing, and had the most creative ideas. Berry white was flavorful and smelled great! Very pungent! This easily moved into my top Five strains! Try some Berry White ASAP‚Äù

‚ÄúBERRY!!! BERRRY WHITEE!!! (in rob dyrdek voice) This strain is amazing the buds were very keefy and using my bong did the job! I would feel very relaxed helping my back but also euphorically happy making my life fantastic‚Äù

‚ÄúOne word, UNDERRATED! Anxiety free indica with not so heavy couch lock. You will be comfortable and chilling but surely not a falling asleep zombie. I suffer from anxiety and occasional insomnia so I lean toward indica. When I can find a strain that doesn't fully knock me out but relieve what I need everything feels right and that my friends is berry white. The effects or this strain far outshine it's decent smell an...‚Äù
‚ÄúIf you find it, and it is BW"..  Get it!!  Don't hesitate.‚Äù"

‚ÄúPicked up from a local dispensary, was a little soft for my liking, so much so it was hard to grind. I'll leave it out for a little bit to dry it up. All in all smoked pretty good, real smooth, minor cough. I have a high tolerance but this one hit me on the 1st bowl within 7 minutes. Head high then body relaxation. It made me more creative and logical. Ex. I had an idea for an invention while toking back on God's Gif...‚Äù

‚ÄúAlso called Whiteberry or White Berry. A cross between White Widow and Blueberry. This is one of my Top 10 strains. An even head/body high that gives focus and clarity to one's mind, yet it  also makes one feel relaxed, uplifted and somewhat euphoric. Good for depression and sparking creativity.‚Äù

‚ÄúActually, from what I've heard and read, Berry White is actually Blue Widow. (blueBERRY x WHITE widow versus BLUEberry x white WIDOW). White Berry is a totally different strain. Maybe merge this with the Blue Widow page and have it redirect? After checking to be sure my genetics information is correct.‚Äù

‚ÄúOk let me start off by saying when I first heard the name of this strain I was a bit on ease. But then after A few puffs from the blunt around the camp fire with about 10 people, I WAS FU*CKED UP.This little girl sneaks up on you like a Lion hunting for food at night! Big big big head high then sneaks down to your body. Very light green with a couple purple spots on the nugs. This is a mixture of Blueberry and White ...‚Äù

‚ÄúI got this strain from DEC Medical, and It's good!!!Great for pain and makes you happy too. If you smoke a lot of it, (by accident, or something) it becomes very Euphoric!!, but in a nice way. And you wont be able to hide the fact, that it will appear to others, that you have just won,the lottery. Happy ain't even the word for this strain. It wears off fast, and is probably around a 7 in strength, Your first oz. will...‚Äù

‚ÄúBerry White was really good for my RLS.  It left me feeling relaxed and happy and drowsy, but not quite sleepy enough to really go to sleep.  Tasted pretty good with that sweet berry taste that I love.  All in all a good med for someone suffering from moderate pain, anxiety, or stress.  Made me feel good without an overwhelming head high.‚Äù

‚ÄúThe name is no lie... Berry White wears it proudly, sporting frosty white and sage green nugs. Break one in half to reveal leaves so juicy, no loupe tool is needed to see that THC! The smell will have you enveloped in sweet fruit and licorice... hypnotic, much like the man himself. Oh yeah!

The high is quick to achieve and mellow as a day in the sun. Think easy, not sleepy. I felt clear enough for the ideas to start...‚Äù

‚ÄúGot an 8th of this at Alternatives in Santa Rosa. Once home i loaded a bowl... smells like blueberry licorice candy as i shredded it up. Inhale was super smooth with a skunky sweet berry taste.  At first i thought there wasnt much of an affect, but as soon as i stood up...  Wow what a head change.  I had planed on smoking and relaxing when i got home.  Instead i found myself taking the dogs out for a long walk and ca...‚Äù
‚ÄúBerry white is what I imagine Betty White smokes. When I smoked this BW it put me into a really deep thought for an hour. I loved it.‚Äù

‚ÄúMethod of consumption - Flower; Smoking.
----

Smell - Definitely sweet. It reminds me of a blueberry sweet tart at first inhale (non-smoking). However, if you give it another sniff or two. You might be able to detect light earthy tones as if you were standing next to a berry bush.
----

Taste - Blueberry with a hint of vanilla. Not overly sweet; It ranges between semi-sweet to sweet. Smooth.
----

Effect -  I've men...‚Äù

The high is quick to achieve and mellow as a day in the sun. Think easy, not sleepy. I felt clear enough for the ideas to start...‚Äù
‚ÄúI have tried it both thru smoke,  and Vape. It works very well for my anxiety, and the pain. Gotta love Blueberry based Hybrids. Ect.‚Äù

‚ÄúBig fan of this strain. Not overpowering but a very nice effect. Positive, uplifting high with just enough heavy to keep you grounded. Versatile & social, functional herb....good for most things you could want to do or for just chillin. Not the best choice for a sleep med imo but that's about the only thing I wouldn't recommend it for.‚Äù
‚ÄúI'm in love I know I'll be wanting this again.. Smells good and taste so good! Lol I'm so happy right now writing this while enjoying berry white love love love highly recommended‚Äù

‚ÄúBeautiful high. Body heavy followed by a sharp head high. Comes on quick and sticks around for awhile. Delicious taste when used with a good vaporizer. This is what a good hybrid is all about. I really like hanging out with Berry.‚Äù

‚ÄúOne of the first things you'll notice when smoking Berry White is its smooth, sweet and tangy flavor. Its mild and pleasant aroma compliments a similarly harsh-free smoke. Its indica properties are certainly present, but they also lean into the hybrid span of the spectrum, offering stimulating cerebral effects while soothing the body of anxiety and pain. I don't think I'd recommend it for insomnia-relief (other hard-...‚Äù
‚ÄúFabulous -- immediate, strong effects, a nice high.  So glad I got to try this!‚Äù

‚ÄúBeautiful high. Body heavy followed by a sharp head high. Comes on quick and sticks around for awhile. Delicious taste when used with a good vaporizer. This is what a good hybrid is all about. I really like hanging out with Berry.‚Äù

‚ÄúThe berry white I got was definitely top shelf compared to what I've been smoking these past few months. It has a distinct berry-pine flavor and taste. I don't mind piney tasting bud, and this is subtle and not too over-bearing. It look blue-ish but has a frosty look to it that makes it dank. The high was fantastic, I was very comfortable and conversational, as well as creative. I bought a dub of it, and had to go ba...‚Äù

‚ÄúIt would be a particularly wise notion to stock up on The BW if you have the opportunity. This strain allowed creativity to flow continuously, while providing a very serene buzz. The BW is a legend in my household currently, and I'm very fortunate to have snagged 2 oz. to partake in. Intellectual conversation was very interesting and deliciously spontaneous. Light green with some lavender purple nodes  and moderate o...‚Äù
‚ÄúProbably my favorite hybrid. Definitely a energetic body feel that lasts a awhile. Berry white is probably the best bud I've smoked for medical reasons.‚Äù
‚ÄúThis is a lovely strain. I have smoked several times before, and I really love it. I'm high right now. Meow.‚Äù
‚ÄúMusic, something to do and Berry White will make depression your *itch, at least of a little bit.  :-)‚Äù

‚ÄúVery nice, it doesn't taste good at all (very harsh flavor in fact) and it is pretty stinky, but this offers a nice euphoric high that does not drain your energy. 

Can make you a little dizzy if you huff too much too fast and it is prone to a little Dry Mouth. Avoid smoking even just a small amount of the stems as they WILL give you a headache.‚Äù

‚ÄúLove love LOVE this one!! Smells and tastes delicious.... The blueberry is potent. Smooth and easy smoke. Good body high without being couch locked, very euphoric and creative high. Made sexy time kinda cosmic... Definitely an aphrodisiac.  This is easily becoming a fave for me‚Äù

‚ÄúFirst time trying this indica from White Widow & Blueberry. It's got a great smell right off, kinda sour berry smell. Smokes great, very sticky small round nuggets. I love this strain as a nightcap when I'm having trouble sleeping...one, two hits and I'm relaxed enough to get into dream land. Great sour berry, blueberry taste. A small amount goes a long way.‚Äù

‚ÄúPicked up this great strain from Terra Holistic Collective. The scent of this flower is a little sweet and isn't too pungent. The nugs are super dense. It's a completely functional high, with a nice body high. Definitely a wake and bake strain is you have stuff to do. This strain is a bit of a creeper. Gonna pick up more very soon.‚Äù
‚ÄúBerry white very good hybrid to get things done or just to smoke with friends‚Äù

‚ÄúI had to try this and thank goodness I did. First of all my dog got ran over, but i was on the Berry White and i was too dam happy to feel sad about it. Then my girlfriend left me for getting the dog get ran over, she even slapped me on the way out the door, but thanks to Berry White, i didn't feel a dam thing. Then she had her brother call me and threaten me but thanks to Barry White i was laughing to much to hear a...‚Äù
‚ÄúThis is a lovely strain. I have smoked several times before, and I really love it. I'm high right now. Meow.‚Äù

‚ÄúTastes great, very smooth., It's the first strain I've ever smoked. It was great. No cough, tasted nice, has a lemon after taste. I felt very relaxed, and my anxiety was gone. I was very happy, energized and felt sooooo happy. Love it. I will always keep this on stock . Great to take during the day as it doesn't give you that couch-lock feeling. 
Highly recommend!‚Äù

‚ÄúI just feel like... I'm the happiest person in the world. I'm like fucking... Bill Gates. And like fucking... Michelle Obama mixed all in one. Maybe even add some Ellen in there too. That's fucking happy. I just want to sit in my own awesomeness.‚Äù
‚ÄúBerry white it a good overall green. Not the most potent strain I have ever had but it differently packs a punch. More of a cerebral effect for sure.‚Äù

‚ÄúFlavor alone gets a 10! Taste is amazing and the buzz is nice and smooth. Only had a gram of it, but it was very tasty and fun strain that lets you down nicely. Great for an evening smoke for any occasion.‚Äù

‚ÄúBerry White leaves me relaxed and helps me forget my chronic back pain. I am always given two very creative insights when I am about an hour into the high. Good strain for the afternoon.‚Äù
‚ÄúAmazing! I literally texted a friend, I feel like I could fight a bear!" It's incredible

‚ÄúI can't say I don't like the Berry White, because I do.  It's just different.  Maybe I had a bit of a preconception about Sativa.  It smokes super easy...the Berry White.  Like smoking a fine mist of air, with a piney aroma and taste.  Easiest I have ever smoked.‚Äù
‚ÄúVery nice relaxing body high. Powerful head high onset that wears off rapidly to leave you with a sleepy euphoric and calm dissipation. Not recommended for socializing.‚Äù
